Text: What File type is the game once downloaded?
how do you get it to work once downloaded??
it asks me for the cd
i cant figure out how to open this !
How do you open this? My computer thinks it's a video clip of 0 seconds. Anyone have this that doesn't need any weird special programs to open?
To open it use Daemon Tools!
Use PowerISO to mount the bin file into a virtual drive and install from there.

For those of you who are getting the "Writing the data failed" and "AR read failed" errors, this is because you have renamed the folder that the game was installed with.

Sadly it must stay as "DISCIPLINE" or you won't be able to save the game. So just go rename that folder and it should work without needing to change compatiblity.
